mapper.sql: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_cost, product_type, total_royal, left_royal, register_date, end_date, description, profile_url, image_url, extra, views FROM product
mapper.select:
WHERE UPPER(product_name) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{word} || '%')
ORDER BY views DESC
ORDER BY left_royal
ORDER BY register_date

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT product_id, product_name, product_cost, product_type, total_royal, left_royal, register_date, end_date, description, profile_url, image_url, extra, views FROM product WHERE product_type = 'luxury' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
